ExportItemConfig.Query: SELECT p.*,(SELECT COUNT(0) FROM pt_shop s WHERE s.merchant_id=p.id) as shop_num FROM pt_merchant p WHERE (Name Like '%{keyword}%' OR Address LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR Tel LIKE '%{keyword}%') limit {page_start},{page_size}
ExportItemConfig.Total: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM pt_merchant WHERE (Name Like '%{keyword}%' OR Address LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR Tel LIKE '%{keyword}%')
